prompt-state.msg: Choose a g-mod identity to host

value.title: Armand "Geist" Walker: Tech Lord
value.text: Whenever you use a [trash] ability, draw 1 card.

value.title: Ele "Smoke" Scovak: Cynosure of the Net
value.text: 1[recurring-credit] Use this credit to pay for using icebreakers.

value.title: Hayley Kaplan: Universal Scholar
value.text: The first time you install a card each turn, you may install another card of the same type from your grip (paying its install cost).

value.title: Kabonesa Wu: Netspace Thrillseeker
value.text: [click]: Search your stack for a non-virus program and install it, lowering its install cost by 1[credit], then shuffle your stack. If that program is still installed when your turn ends, remove it from the game.

value.title: Liza Talking Thunder: Prominent Legislator
value.text: The first time you make a successful run on a central server each turn, draw 2 cards and take 1 tag.

value.title: Los: Data Hijacker
value.text: The first time the Corp rezzes a piece of ice each turn, gain 2[credit].

value.title: MaxX: Maximum Punk Rock
value.text: When your turn begins, trash the top 2 cards of your stack. Draw 1 card.

value.title: Noise: Hacker Extraordinaire
value.text: Whenever you install a virus program, the Corp trashes the top card of R&D.

value.title: Nyusha "Sable" Sintashta: Symphonic Prodigy
value.text: When your turn begins, identify your mark. (If you don’t have a mark, a random central server becomes your mark for this turn.) The first time each turn you make a successful run on your mark, gain [click].

value.title: Quetzal: Free Spirit
value.text: 0[credit]: Break 1 barrier subroutine. Use this ability only once per turn.

value.title: Reina Roja: Freedom Fighter
value.text: The first piece of ice the Corp rezzes each turn costs 1[credit] more to rez.

value.title: René "Loup" Arcemont: Party Animal
value.text: The first time each turn you trash a card you are accessing, gain 1[credit] and draw 1 card.

value.title: Ryō "Phoenix" Ōno: Out of the Ashes
value.text: The first time each turn a run becomes successful after a subroutine resolved during that run, gain 1[credit] and the Corp trashes 1 card from HQ.

value.title: Sebastião Souza Pessoa: Activist Organizer
value.text: Whenever you take 1 or more tags, if you had no tags, you may install 1 connection resource from your grip, paying 2[credit] less. As an additional cost to trash a connection resource with the basic action, the Corp must trash 1 card from HQ.

value.title: Steve Cambridge: Master Grifter
value.text: The first time each turn you make a successful run on HQ, you may choose 2 cards in your heap. If you do, the Corp removes 1 of those cards from the game, then you add the other card to your grip.
